alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 12 at 2:30PM CDT until May 12 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 229 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Spalding, or 22 miles west of Albion, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * The tornado will be near... Bartlett around 255 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Cumminsville, Four Corners and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 151. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
